Meet the Guide Dogs

Clark has had the privilege of working with seven incredible guide dogs over the years. Each one has been a loyal companion and trusted partner.

Uri

2003-2010 • Yellow Labrador Retriever

Uri was Clark's first guide dog, providing faithful service for 7 years. He was a gentle giant who loved to play fetch.

Emma

2010-2016 • Black Labrador Retriever

Emma was a spirited and energetic guide who loved to work. She had an incredible ability to navigate busy city streets.

Molly

2016-2019 • Golden Retriever

Molly was a sweet and patient guide dog who excelled in crowd work. She loved belly rubs and was always ready to work.

Abbie

2019-2021 • Yellow Labrador Retriever

Abbie was a confident and intelligent guide dog. She had a special bond with Clark and was known for her tail wags.

Petunia

2021-2022 • Black Labrador Retriever

Petunia was a playful and loving guide dog. Despite her short time in harness, she made a lasting impact.

Jasmine

2022-2024 • Yellow Labrador/Golden Mix

Jasmine was a devoted guide dog with a calm demeanor. She loved long walks and was excellent at guiding.

Current

Luna

2024-Present • Black Labrador Retriever

Luna is Clark's current guide dog. She is energetic, intelligent, and already showing great promise in her work.

Inspiring measurable acts of compassion and kindness in communities worldwide. We guide future leaders to see life through a lens of Compassion, Kindness, and Empathy.
